comment: Thank you to everyone who has supported me , messaged me , listened to me and been there for me . I m fighting and it s because of you all . I will reply to everyone in time . I truly thank you from the bottom of my heart . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Thank you to everyone who has supported me , messaged me , listened to me and been there for me . I m fighting and it s because of you all . I will reply to everyone in time . I truly thank you from the bottom of my heart . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i
                  :part (h / heart))
            :ARG1 (e / everyone
                  :ARG0-of (s / support-01
                        :ARG1 ii)
                  :ARG0-of (m2 / message-01
                        :ARG2 ii)
                  :ARG0-of (l / listen-01
                        :ARG1 ii)
                  :ARG0-of (b / be-located-at-91
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG2 (t2 / there))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (f / fight-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i
                        :part h))
            :op2 (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you
                        :mod (a2 / all))
                  :ARG1 f))
      :snt3 (r / reply-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i
                  :part h)
            :ARG1 e)
      :time (ii4 / in-time)
      :snt4 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii5 / i
                  :part h)
            :ARG1 y)
      :manner (f2 / from
            :op1 h
            :mod (b2 / bottom))
      :ARG1-of (t4 / true-01))

comment: So happy to hear from you . Keep it moving forward . One foot in front of the other . Remember ... you are a warrior . x
amr:

                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (y / you))
            :ARG1 ii
            :degree (s / so))
      :snt2 (k / keep-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (m2 / move-01

                  :direction (f / forward)))
      :snt3 (r / remember-01

            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (w / warrior
                  :domain y3))
